statements: SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, products_offered FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id > 2 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person, email, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, products_offered FROM vendors WHERE products_offered LIKE '%software%';
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC, vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_information;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, vendor_location FROM vendor_information;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendor_information WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM product_offering WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM product_offering ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_information ORDER BY vendor_name DESC, vendor_location ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM vendor_information WHERE vendor_location='New York';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM product_offering WHERE vendor_id=1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, vendor_location FROM vendor_information WHERE vendor_id=2;
SELECT * FROM vendor_information INNER JOIN product_offering ON vendor_information.vendor_id = product_offering.vendor_id ORDER BY vendor_information.vendor_id ASC, product_offering.product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name
SELECT * FROM products JOIN vendors ON products.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT category_name, product_name, price FROM product_categories JOIN products ON product_categories.category_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT address_line1, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC, vendor_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city='New York' AND state='NY';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, address, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, address, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT vendors.vendor_name, products.product_name, categories.category_name FROM vendors JOIN vendor_products ON vendors.vendor_id = vendor_products.vendor_id JOIN products ON vendor_products.product_id = products.product_id JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id WHERE vendors.vendor_id = 2;

SELECT vendor_name, product_name, category_name FROM vendors JOIN vendor_products ON vendors.vendor_id = vendor_products.vendor_id JOIN products ON vendor_products.product_id = products.product_id JOIN categories ON vendor_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.category_name = 'Electronics';
